enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Delegates discussed new draft proposals from the Chair and the Secretariat`s proposed budget.
Nigeria, for the G-77/CHINA, noted that the frequency of expert group meetings supported by core funding must be consistent with COP decision 4/CP.7.
The EU, CANADA, SOUTH AFRICA and others, opposed by the RUSSIAN FEDERATION, supported the proposed budget, given increased requirements due to the Kyoto Protocol`s entry into force.
The US stressed its concerns over the division of Kyoto Protocol and Convention expenses, rather than the size of the budget.
The Chair will consult informally and present revised proposals at the group`s final meeting on Tuesday.
